title: A Chat with the 'Good Omens' Crew at NYCC | TV Insider
author: TV Insider
comment: Aaaand right out of the gate, Michael's shoehorning in their "special bond" again. 😂 I love him and his aggressive shipping so dang much.
I wonder how Neil felt in this listening to the actors describe his characters.
description:
We sat down with David Tennant, Michael Sheen, Neil Gaiman, Jon Hamm, Miranda Richardson, and Douglas Mackinnon at NYCC to talk about their upcoming Amazon Prime Series.
